meta.id: as far/near as I can tell
stems: as far as i can tell
as far/near as i can tell
as near as i can tell

hwi.hw: as far/near as I can tell

dt: used to say that something seems to one to be certain way

dt.t: {it}As far/near as I can tell{/it}, he is happy at his new job.

shortdef: —used to say that something seems to one to be certain way
